title: PuppyLinuxCarolina_archive
description:
Carolina 1.2 is released 31.1.2014

torrent archive contain new and old isos and deltas. select what you want.

from/more at http://murga-linux.com/puppy/viewtopic.php?p=755121#755121



Carolina Linux is a fork of the Saluki project. Saluki is a woof-build based on Racy 5.2 with Xfce 


Carolina Change Log
1.2 change log from 1.1

-add go-mtpfs
 -add pmtp and menu right click mount/unmount MTP Devices
 -add system restore
 -add hddtemp-0.3-beta15-52
 -add refresh desktop menu right click
 -add fonts and move to adrv
 -add inxi-1.9.17
 -add xfce4-xkb-plugin-0.5.4.3
 -add Gconf/gnutls,xdotool to woof-installed
 -update PackIt-1.5 
 -update add favorites 
 -update yad-0.25.1
 -update to hotshots-2.0.1
 -update smplayer-0.8.6-r5971
 -update thememanager - wallpaper
 -update pac-tools
 -update to wget-1.15
 -update to firefox-26.0
 -update to thunderbird-24.2.0
 -update to libreoffice-4.1.4.2
 -update to exo-0.10.2
 -update to xmeumaker-3.2.0
 -update to mtpaint-3.44.56
 -update to ffconvert-lina-1.4-1
 -update to nomacs-1.6.2
 -update pmount
 -move gconf, gnutls to main

 -change uninstall
 -change defaulttexteditor to leafpad for puppy_lina_1.2.sfs

 -fix icon builtin files
